abstract: JPMorgan Chase has hired T. Timothy Ryan Jr., the president and chief executive of the Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association, to be its new top regulatory officer.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has hired T. Timothy Ryan Jr., the president and chief executive of the Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association, to be its new top regulatory officer.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase announced on Tuesday that it had hired T. Timothy Ryan Jr., a senior Wall Street lobbyist, as its new top regulatory officer.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Securities Industry and Financial Markets Assn
